title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 105.11 - Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 105.11 - Insurance

State Regulations

Include: Fidelity or surety bonds covering employees and agents. Burglary and robbery insurance premiums. Public liability insurance premiums (excl. owned real estate). Premiums for insurance on office contents. Cost of insurance on automobiles. All other insurance premiums not specifically provided for in other operating accounts. Exclude: Items includible in employee relations and welfare. Items includible in real estate expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
105.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
